meanings.definition: The outermost nucleated cytoplasmic layer of the Schwann cells that encloses the myelin sheath of a nerve fiber.
meanings.sent1: The neurilemmas protect the nerve fibers.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the neurilemmas to understand nerve health.
meanings.sent3: The neurilemmas threw a party for the myelin sheath.
meanings.sent4: The neurilemmas are like guardians surrounding the nerve fibers.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow color of the neurilemmas makes them easy to spot under the microscope.

meanings.definition: A thin membranous sheath enveloping a nerve fiber.
